C

Canvas - Class in <Unnamed>
Class Canvas - a class to allow for simple graphical drawing on a canvas.
Canvas(String) - Constructor for class Canvas
Create a Canvas with default height, width and background colour (300, 300, white).
Canvas(String, int, int) - Constructor for class Canvas
Create a Canvas with default background colour (white).
Canvas(String, int, int, Color) - Constructor for class Canvas
Create a Canvas.
canvas - Static variable in class DrawingCanvas
 
changeColour(String) - Method in class Pen
Changes this pen's colour to the specified colour.
colour() - Method in class Pen
Returns this pen's colour.

D

direction() - Method in class Pen
Returns this pen's current direction.
down() - Method in class Pen
Lowers this pen down onto the canvas.
draw(Shape) - Method in class Canvas
Draw a given shape onto the canvas.
drawImage(Image, int, int) - Method in class Canvas
Draws an image onto the canvas.
DrawingCanvas - Class in <Unnamed>
DrawingCanvas specializes the general-purpose Canvas class from the BlueJ Web site, so that only one DrawingCanvas object is created and shared by all objects that draw on it.
drawLine(int, int, int, int, float) - Method in class Canvas
Draws a line on the Canvas.
drawLine(int, int, int, int, int, String) - Method in class DrawingCanvas
Draws a straight line with the specified colour on the canvas between points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2)
drawString(String, int, int) - Method in class Canvas
Draws a String on the Canvas.

E

EAST - Static variable in class Pen
 
erase() - Method in class Canvas
Erase the whole canvas.
erase(Shape) - Method in class Canvas
Erase a given shape's interior on the screen.
eraseOutline(Shape) - Method in class Canvas
Erases a given shape's outline on the screen.
eraseString(String, int, int) - Method in class Canvas
Erases a String on the Canvas.

F

fill(Shape) - Method in class Canvas
Fill the internal dimensions of a given shape with the current foreground colour of the canvas.

G

getFont() - Method in class Canvas
Returns the current font of the canvas.
getForegroundColour() - Method in class Canvas
Returns the current colour of the foreground.
getHeight() - Method in class DrawingCanvas
Returns the height of this drawing canvas.
getSize() - Method in class Canvas
Returns the size of the canvas.
getWidth() - Method in class DrawingCanvas
Returns the width of this drawing canvas.

I

Determines if this pen is in the down position.

Determines if this pen is in the up position.

Provide information on visibility of the Canvas.

M

move20() - Method in class Pen
Moves this pen by 20 pixels in the current direction.
moveBy(int) - Method in class Pen
Moves this pen by the specified number of pixels in the current direction.

N

NORTH - Static variable in class Pen
 

P

Pen - Class in <Unnamed>
A Pen is a tool for drawing straight lines on a canvas.
Pen() - Constructor for class Pen
Constructs a new blue Pen in the down position, placed in the center of the canvas, and pointing East (i.e., by default, it will move horizontally towards the right of the canvas).
place(int, int) - Method in class Pen
Places this pen at the specified coordinates.

S

setBackgroundColour(Color) - Method in class Canvas
Sets the background colour of the Canvas.
setFont(Font) - Method in class Canvas
changes the current Font used on the Canvas
setForegroundColour(Color) - Method in class Canvas
Sets the foreground colour of the Canvas.
setSize(int, int) - Method in class Canvas
Sets the size of the canvas.
setVisible(boolean) - Method in class Canvas
Set the canvas visibility and brings canvas to the front of screen when made visible.
SOUTH - Static variable in class Pen
 

T

turnClockwise() - Method in class Pen
Turns this pen clockwise by 90 degrees: N -> E -> S -> W -> N.
turnCounterClockwise() - Method in class Pen
Turns this pen counterclockwise by 90 degrees: N -> W -> S -> E -> N.

U

up() - Method in class Pen
Lifts this pen up from the canvas.

W

wait(int) - Method in class Canvas
Waits for a specified number of milliseconds before finishing.
WEST - Static variable in class Pen
 

X

xLocation() - Method in class Pen
Returns the x-coordinate of this pen's location on the canvas.

Y

yLocation() - Method in class Pen
Returns the y-coordinate of this pen's location on the canvas.
